Drinking plain water, or bottled, will help your skin either way. You can keep your face hydrated by drinking water, and also splashing it on your face - both methods work. Splashing water does two things for your face - it rinses your pours out and shrinks them. It's free to do this! So if you feel like your face is oily, or if you need a little refreshing, bring a spray bottle with you and spray yourself throughout the day.
